oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter recommending S. M. Alexander for admission to the United Confederate Veterans (UCV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unsigned petition attesting to Col. S[mith]. M. Alexander's fitness for admission to the Turney Bivouac of the UCV in Winchester, Tenn. According to an attached newspaper clipping, Alexander was one of the last three survivors of Gen. Nathan Bedford Forrest's original escort. A Pvt. S. M. Alexander did serve with the 3rd TN Cav. (Forrest's Old) Regt.
